content: annie s simple crochet hat pattern is designed to fit between mid-ear and the base of the earlobe if you would like your hat to be longer you can work 3 additional rounds of half_double_crochet to add 1 extra inch of height this pattern includes sizes preemie newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-24 months small child 3-5 years child 6-10 years teen adult small adult medium and adult large > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until april 30 2022 > at 11 59 pm et simply add the pattern > to your cart before 11 59 pm est on > april 30th and it will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on april 20 2022 at 5 00 pm est > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesign/ youtube https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confi… facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesign/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2022 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
